evidence.claim: LifeCare Home Health utilizes AWS for scalable cloud infrastructure including Lambda and RDS for managing healthcare data.
They have integrations using Twilio for communication purposes, enhancing patient engagement through SMS notifications.
LifeCare supports interoperability standards like HL7 and FHIR for data exchange between healthcare systems.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 standards, indicating need for API healthcare data exchange.
